lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. trade representative and head of Washington's delegation to the talks, told Reuters on his return from London that the United States is willing to resume the coffee negotiations as early as April if necessary.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. sources said West Germany's support was at times qualified and there is some concern that the European Community could come under pressure to be more accommodative to producers in future talks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the Reagan administration would be reviewing the coffee policy situation following the collapse of the London talks, but "nobody is proposing we change our position."
